projects.title: Real-Time Stock Predictor
projects.description: A web app that forecasts short-term stock movements using live market data served through FastAPI.
features: Trained Random Forest model on 20K stock records with RSI and moving-average indicators
Visualized real-time results in Next.js using Chart.js
Delivered one-minute-interval predictions with clear gain/loss insights

projects.title: AutoGradeX
projects.description: An automated grading dashboard computing weighted scores from CSV submissions using Pandas pipelines.
features: Interactive Plotly charts in Streamlit to display distribution and performance analytics

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: A command-line task management application demonstrating dynamic memory allocation and data encapsulation.
features: Designed user and task management modules with priority- and deadline-based sorting
Ensured persistent data storage through file operations

projects.title: CRM System
projects.description: A lightweight Flask web app to manage customer and order data for small businesses.
features: Used SQLAlchemy ORM for structured data storage
Chart.js for visualizing customer activity and purchase trends
Improved access to records and reduced manual data handling by 30%
